channel.title: Hack This Site
channel.description:
I found this site while looking for another similiar to this one. Anyways check it out and see how far you can get. http://www.hackthissite.org/
So far I'm on the third test under Basic Web.

item.title: Hack This Site
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

This is an old site.

I am a member and have solved most application challanges, I have the passwrds in a .txt just never got around to submiting them.

If you need ant help with the challanges go to:
http://criticalsecurity.net/

Read full topic

item.title: Hack This Site
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I was always aware of this site but never signed up.

Just signed up like 10 minutes ago, Im on the fourth challenge. They are pretty fun because it's easy to start off with. Number 3 was a little hard at first, but then I found a little something in the button code(An url).

Rofl, number 4 is fun. All you do is change the email you your's, and it sends you the password -.-

edit* 4 Is messed up, they had problems with the stmp server so it basically gives u the pass I assume 5 is going to be the same.

Read full topic
